content.text: Match ends, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 1, Barcelona 3.
Second Half ends, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 1, Barcelona 3.
Attempt missed. Stefan Kießling (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Gonzalo Castro with a cross following a set piece situation.
Foul by Carles Puyol (Barcelona).
Stefan Kießling (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Offside, Barcelona. Dani Alves tries a through ball, but Thiago Alcántara is caught offside.
Offside, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Stefan Kießling tries a through ball, but Karim Bellarabi is caught offside.
Substitution, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Danny da Costa replaces Vedran Corluka.
Substitution, Bayer 04 Leverkusen. Karim Bellarabi replaces André Schürrle.
Goal!  Bayer 04 Leverkusen 1, Barcelona 3. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Dani Alves.
Attempt missed. André Schürrle (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Vedran Corluka.
Thiago Alcántara (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.

Substitution, Barcelona. Thiago Alcántara replaces Andrés Iniesta.
